original_text: So they established a decree to make proclamation throughout all Israel, from Beersheba even to Dan, that they should come to keep the passover unto the Lord God of Israel at Jerusalem: for they had not done it of a long time in such sort as it was written.
korean_text: 드디어 왕이 명령을 내려 브엘세바에서부터 단까지 온 이스라엘에 공포하여 일제히 예루살렘으로 와서 이스라엘 하나님 여호와의 유월절을 지키라 하니 이는 기록한 규례대로 오랫동안 지키지 못하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: to make proclamation throughout all Israel
that they should come to keep the passover
unto the Lord God of Israel at Jerusalem
for they had not done it of a long time
in such sort as it was written
